name: Prison
description: A fortified site for soldiers and defense; adventurers could obtain contracts, enlist aid, or break in to free captives.
atmosphere: The prison has a grim, oppressive atmosphere with the scent of despair and the sound of clanging doors and the moans of prisoners. The air carries the weight of punishment and the essential nature of justice, while the atmosphere crackles with the tension of captivity and the constant reminder of the consequences of crime.
